name: Sephira Tale ~First Outing~
description:
"It is time, young scion!

The world has been asleep for too long!

Remember your past lives,
and uncover the true legacy of this world.

You are the last light of hope in this world.
Your time has come, Sephira of Shadow.

So awaken your soul, and spread your wings!
Bring back the light that was stolen from this world!"

This is the tale of the first outing of Reina, a shadow sephira living in a floating island. Kit is given an errand to pick up Soren, a young sephiroth (sorcerer) from a nearby Arcanum, where xey are studying wild magic, and where xey are sent to retrieve the Akashic Grimoire, an ancient tome containing the writings of sephirae from 1000+ years ago.

Things go bad when a rogue band of religious cultists targeted one of the sephirae who had been studying in the Arcanum at the time. Reina got involved, and now getting home is made a lot harder.

This game has about 2 hours of gameplay, and is created as part of the Touch the Stars 2021 RPG Maker MZ Game Jam being hosted by Komodo Games.
